Seoul is the capital city of South Korea, a fascinating country in East Asia ðŸŒ. This vibrant city is full of interesting sights ðŸŒŸ, delicious food ðŸ², and amazing people!

Where Is Seoul? ðŸ“ #

Seoul is located in the northwestern part of South Korea, quite close to the border with North Korea ðŸ—ºï¸. It sits along the Han River ðŸžï¸, which divides the city into two halves. If you look at a map, you can find Seoul at these coordinates: 37.532600, 127.024612.
